RSS.title: $3 billion in Bitcoin left exchanges this week amid FTX contagion fears
RSS.description: It appears that more investors are choosing to self-custody their BTC funds in the wake of the FTX scandal and fallout.
RSS.author: William Suberg

RSS.title: Hong Kong to avoid FTX-like scenario through transparency and supervision
RSS.description: Financial Secretary Paul Chan highlighted the importance of being ‚Äústeady and cautious‚Äù when promoting the development of the virtual asset industry in Hong Kong.
RSS.author: Arijit Sarkar

RSS.title: Vitalik Buterin calls out FTX for virtue signaling:  ‚ÄòDeserves what it‚Äôs getting‚Äô
RSS.description: While acknowledging the damage caused by FTX, Buterin believes that FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried, as a person, deserves love.
RSS.author: Arijit Sarkar

RSS.title: Binance, Huobi Block FTT Deposits After $400M Worth of Tokens Illicitly Released
RSS.description: The tokens were illicitly released from FTT‚Äôs main deployer address.
RSS.author: Shaurya Malwa

RSS.title: Huobi and Gate.io under fire for allegedly sharing snapshots using loaned funds
RSS.description: A wallet address linked to the Huobi exchange was found transferring 10,000 ETH to Binance and OKX deposit wallets soon after releasing its asset snapshot.
RSS.author: Arijit Sarkar

RSS.title: Huobi Asset Transparency Report Reveals $3.5B in Crypto Holdings
RSS.description: Huobi held $920 million worth of its own HT token as of Nov. 12. The exchange has promised to perform a Merkle Tree Proof of Reserves audit with a third party within 30 days.

RSS.title: Crypto.com accidentally sends 320k ETH to Gate.io, recovers funds days after
RSS.description: Crypto.com CEO confirmed the return of the funds and reassured the investors that new processes and features were implemented to prevent a reoccurrence.
RSS.author: Arijit Sarkar

RSS.title: Bahamas Securities Regulator Says It Didn't Order FTX to Reopen Local Withdrawals
RSS.description: Crypto exchange FTX was not required to allow Bahamas-based customers to withdraw their funds, a local financial regulator said Saturday.
RSS.author: Nikhilesh De

RSS.title: Regulator denies asking FTX to prioritize withdrawals for Bahamian clients
RSS.description: The statement from the Securities Commission of The Bahamas refutes a claim from FTX that it has been facilitating withdrawals in accordance with Bahamian regulations.
RSS.author: Felix Ng

RSS.title: Plaid suspends FTX.US access to user data after ‚Äòconcerning‚Äô reports
RSS.description: United-States-based Twitter users had been reporting suspicious data access requests from FTX.US to their bank accounts.
RSS.author: Felix Ng

RSS.title: FTX Hack Sparks Revolution at Serum DEX as Solana Devs Plot Alameda's Ouster
RSS.description: Developers are scrambling to create a new version of the on-chain liquidity hub that has no ties to Sam Bankman-Fried‚Äôs burning empire.
RSS.author: Danny Nelson

RSS.title: Sam Bankman-Fried is ‚Äòunder supervision‚Äô in Bahamas, looking to flee to Dubai
RSS.description: It is understood that Sam Bankman-Fried and two former FTX associates are currently ‚Äúunder supervision‚Äù by Bahamian authorities.

RSS.title: FTX goes up in flames and impacts broader crypto industry, causing regulators to respond: Hodler‚Äôs Digest, Nov. 6-12
RSS.author: Editorial Staff

RSS.title: Crypto token supplies explained: Circulating, maximum and total supply
RSS.description: Circulating, maximum and total supply are all essential metrics for an investor‚Äôs price discovery. Find out here what they are and how they can be used.

RSS.title: 5 reasons 2023 will be a tough year for global markets
RSS.description: From inflation to energy shortages and general instability, markets are set for a turbulent year ahead.
RSS.author: Joseph Bradley

RSS.title: FTX CEO John Ray Confirms Late-Night Hack, Says Company Is Working With Law Enforcement
RSS.description: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX‚Äôs new CEO, John Ray, took to Twitter Saturday to confirm that the exchange and its U.S. subsidiary, FTX US, were hacked last night in an attack that drained hundreds of millions of dollars in crypto out of the exchanges‚Äô wallets.

RSS.title: Sam Bankman-Fried denies rumors that he fled to Argentina
RSS.description: SBF stepped down as CEO of FTX on Nov. 11 after initiating Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings in the District of Delaware.

RSS.title: FTX reportedly hacked as officials flag abnormal wallet activity
RSS.description: Wallets tied to FTX and FTX US have seen $659 million in cumulative outflows over the past 24 hours, according to Nansen.
RSS.author: Sam Bourgi

RSS.title: The Epic Collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX Exchange: A Crypto Markets Timeline

RSS.author: Sage D. Young, Bradley Keoun

RSS.title: What is a 51% attack and how to detect it?

RSS.title: For Coinbase, FTX‚Äôs Bankruptcy Has Its Pluses and Minuses

RSS.title: Hackers keeping stolen crypto: What is the long-term solution?

RSS.title: Tether blacklists $31.4M USDT following FTX‚Äôs alleged hack, Musk reacts
